body:
Comment 3: 
You can pregenerate anything you want by redirecting
the output of godoc (or godoc --html) into files.

It might be interesting to have a godoc --nroff output
mechanism, but it might also be a flop.  Hard to say
but feel free to try it.

All the configuration options you are supposed to
need from the Plan 9 tool chain are supposed to
be mentioned in godoc.  If there's an option you are
looking up often and isn't there, please let us know
and we will add it to the doc.go files.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
